pr_title: Fixed Issues with Missing UI Elements

timeline.message:
Update AddOperation.jsx

Fixed an issue where the OPTIONS tooltip would not display

Update Create.jsx

Fixed an issue where the button would not appear displayed.

Since the button is of 'Text' variant and displayed on Paper, the ContrastText color of Paper is used.

timeline.bodyText:
Used Contrast of background for Paper here because the button is a text variant and on top of Paper component.
Primary Contrast can show up as white on white.
timeline.author: daz96050
